搏.definition: to fight; to combat; to seize; (of heart) to beat

搏動.definition: to beat rhythmically; to throb; to pulsate

搏命.definition: to fight with all one has

搏感情.definition: (Tw) to build up a rapport; to cultivate a warm relationship (from Taiwanese 跋感情, Tai-lo pr. [pua̍h-kám-tsîng])

搏戰.definition: to fight; to struggle; to wage war

搏擊.definition: to fight, esp. with hands; wrestling (as a sport); to wrestle; to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc); to capture prey

搏殺.definition: to fight and kill; to engage in fierce combat (also used figuratively of opposing chess players)

搏髀.definition: to beat time by slapping one's thighs

搏鬥.definition: to wrestle; to fight; to struggle
